text: Mohammed al-Bashir (born 1983) is a Syrian engineer and politician. He became the 70th prime minister of Syria and the Prime Minister of the Syrian Transitional Government on 9 December 2024. He has also been the Prime Minister of the Syrian Salvation Government since 13 January 2024. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Syria Category:Current national leaders
title: Mohammed al-Bashir
